revised_title: Equilibrium Shape of Two-Dimensional Drops at Fluid/Liquid Interfaces
tldr: The article investigates the equilibrium shape of a horizontal row of two-dimensional drops approaching their homophase at a fluid/liquid interface. The authors use analytical equations and elliptic integrals to study the shape and behavior of the drops, providing insights into the coalescence of drops in a row and the approach of a row of cylinders to a fluid/liquid interface.
